I have been contacted by a law firm in England that is. Work visa. Workpermit and ready for the next hotel to my friends so they can apply to send money to the lawyer. A lot of money pound 16,574.33 (814,812.46 baht, Thai), but did not get a visa. And workpermit. Together, they have stopped us. I get a refund from them
I need help now, I need the money urgently to restore the bank because they will take home and eat.
